Function reference

Summary Scores

This is the main function to compute the summary scores

computeSigScores()
Compute the Summary Scores

Plot Summary Scores

These are the main functions to visualise the summary scores

heatmapSigScores()
Plot Summary Scores as Heatmap
heatmapCorSigScores()
Plot Correlation of Summary Scores as Heatmap
boxplotSigScores()
Plot Summary Scores as Box Plots
scatterplotSigScores()
Plot Summary Scores as Scatter Plots

Summary Scores for Matrix

These functions are used to compute the summary scores

meanScores()
Arithmetic Mean Scores
trimmedMeanScores()
Trimmed Arithmetic Mean Scores
weightedMeanScores()
Weighted Arithmetic Mean Scores
interquartileMeanScores()
Interquartile Mean (IQM) Scores
medianScores()
Median Scores
modeScores()
Mode Scores
midrangeScores()
Midrange Scores
midhingeScores()
Midhinge Scores
trimeanScores()
Trimean Scores
bristowScores()
Bristow Scores
reviewedBristowScores()
Reviewed Bristow Scores
weightedSumScores()
Weighted Sum Scores
ssGseaScores()
Single Sample Gene Set Enrichment Analysis (ssGSEA) Scores
gsvaScores()
Gene Set Variation Analysis (GSVA) Scores
plageScores()
Pathway Level Analysis of Gene Expression (PLAGE) Scores
zScores()
Z-Scores

These functions are used to compute the summary scores

meanScore()

trimmedMeanScore()
Trimmed Arithmetic Mean Score
weightedMeanScore()
Weighted Arithmetic Mean Score
interquartileMeanScore()
Interquartile Mean (IQM) Score

Median Scores

Mode Score

Midrange Score

Midhinge Score

Trimean Score
bristowScore()
Bristow Score
reviewedBristowScore()
Reviewd Bristow Score
weightedSumScore()
Weighted Sum Score
ssGseaScore()
Single Sample Gene Set Enrichment Analysis (ssGSEA) Score
gsvaScore()
Gene Set Variation Analysis (GSVA) Score
plageScore()
Pathway Level Analysis of Gene Expression (PLAGE) Score
zScore()
Z Score
